thread.title: The Scariest Clown Of All Time Is BACK In The First Trailer For Stephen King's IT!
thread.title_full: The Scariest Clown Of All Time Is BACK In The First Trailer For Stephen King's IT! | PerezHilton.com

author: perezhilton
title: The Scariest Clown Of All Time Is BACK In The First Trailer For Stephen King's IT!
text:
Prepare to RUN IN TERROR!
We weren't so sure about this new version of Stephen King 's classic novel IT after seeing the first pics of Alexander Skarsgård 's little brother in clown makeup.
Related: New Report Of Armed Clowns Haunting A Pennsylvania Hillside 
But we were dead wrong!
The first trailer is moody, nostalgic, terrifying — perfect for Stranger Things fans who are ready to step into the advanced class!
Ch-ch-check out the trailer for IT , haunting theaters September 8 (below)! 

Tags: alexander skarsgård , clown , film flickers , gifs , it , movie trailer , remake , scary! , stephen king , stranger things
